TopicTitle: Now that Christmas is behind us, get your New Year fireworks ready!

Articles.Content:
Who said Kerbals can't celebrate new years?

Christmas is over already, so that means there's only one holiday next to celebrate: New Year! Create fireworks with the VAB, and post a picture of the missiles soaring freely above the KSC. If you want added bonus, figure a way to make them explode into big, fiery and beautiful explosions!... or cover up your accidents as being new year fireworks. Kerbals are bound to like it either way.
